name: vs-prompt-hider
description: Privacy-preserving middleware for AI assistants - anonymize sensitive data before sending prompts to LLMs

chatParticipants.name: PromptHider
chatParticipants.description: Obfuscate sensitive data in your prompts

languageModelTools.name: prompthider_execute_command
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Executes a shell command in the VS Code integrated terminal. Use this tool whenever the user asks you to run, execute, or invoke a command. The command string may contain anonymized placeholders (such as IP_1, USER_A@domain.tld, API_KEY_1) â€” these are automatically resolved to their real values before execution, so always pass the anonymized token as-is.

command.description: The shell command to execute. Pass anonymized tokens exactly as they appear (e.g. 'ssh IP_1', 'curl -H Authorization: API_KEY_1 https://HOST_1/api'). They will be de-anonymized locally before the command runs.

languageModelTools.name: prompthider_scp_transfer
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Transfers files between the local machine and a remote server via SCP. Paths may contain anonymized tokens (IP_1, FILE_PATH_1, etc.) which are automatically resolved before execution. Use for uploading scripts, configs, or downloading reports and logs.

source.description: Source path. For remote files use 'user@HOST_TOKEN:/remote/path'. For local files use a local path or FILE_PATH token.

destination.description: Destination path. For remote files use 'user@HOST_TOKEN:/remote/path'. For local files use a local path or FILE_PATH token.

recursive.description: Set to true to copy directories recursively (-r flag). Defaults to false.

prompthider.autoAnonymize.description: Automatically anonymize sensitive data when detected

prompthider.tokenConsistency.description: Use consistent tokens for the same values across sessions

prompthider.mappings.autoClearOnSessionS.description: Automatically clear token mappings when a new VS Code session starts for this workspace.

prompthider.mappings.autoClearOnRuleshee.description: Automatically clear token mappings when switching the active rulesheet.

prompthider.agent.maxToolRounds.description: Maximum LM tool-calling rounds for @PromptHider before the loop is stopped.

prompthider.agent.executionMode.description: Execution mode for PromptHider tools. 'captured' runs commands once and returns structured output to the model. 'terminal' sends commands to the PromptHider terminal and returns handoff status.

prompthider.agent.toolScope.description: Controls which language-model tools are exposed to @PromptHider.

prompthider.logging.level.description: Controls PromptHider diagnostic logging verbosity for output channel and local .prompthider logs.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
